title: Drawing, "Imaginary Classical Temple in the Mountains", 1800–25
medium: Black chalk on cream wove paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Stairs, high building with portico in front, all situated on substructure. Two figures in classical attire, one seated, one standing below steps, extending right arms.  Background at right, trees, at left, top of trees and mountains.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Imaginary Classical Temple in the Mountains", 1800–25. Black chalk on cream wove paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2440.
